source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a medium shot of five metallic soldier figures, showing them from the waist up. They are arranged in a diagonal line, with the soldier on the right positioned in the foreground and the others receding into the middle ground towards the left against a background wall. The camera, positioned at the soldiers' level, then pulls back slowly. This movement reveals that the soldiers are framed within a white window, which is located in the center of the screen. In the final composition, the white window frame occupies the foreground, while the soldiers are now seen in the middle ground through the window.
